casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Carnell Lavance CALHOUN 54P18-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 30, 2019 Carnell Lavance Calhoun, for Calhoun, Carnell Lavance. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Todd Williams, District Attorney, for State of N.C. From N.C. Court of Appeals (P18-799); From Buncombe (05CRS005942-43 05CRS052754 05CRS052758-62 06CRS11447) The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd of December 2018 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review: "Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of January 2019." Ervin, J. recused
